feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - API change for OS reinstallation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 10, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

May 22, 22:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, change is scheduled on our API.
Starting from the 10th of September 2024, the following API call will stop to accept SSH public key name for OS reinstallation:
POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start

You are not affected by this change in one of the following situations:
- You are using OVHcloud Control Panel rather than OVHcloud API to perform OS reinstallation on your dedicated server,
- You are performing a Windows OS reinstallation on your dedicated server,
- You are performing OS reinstallation with password-based authentication rather than SSH key-based authentication on your dedicated server.

If you are affected by this API change, you need to update the payload as follow (templateName and sshKeyName values to be replaced):

- Example of payload that will stop working after the 10th of September 2024:
{
"templateName": "debian12_64",
"details": {
"sshKeyName": "my-amazing-ssh-key-name"
}
}

- Modified payload that currently works and will continue working after the 10th of September 2024:
{
"templateName": "debian12_64",
"userMetadata": [
{
"key": "sshKey",
"value": "ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAAAgQC9xPpdqP3sx2H+gcBm65tJEaUbuifQ1uGkgrWtNY0PRKNNPdy+3yoVOtxk6Vjo4YZ0EU/JhmQfnrK7X7Q5vhqYxmozi0LiTRt0BxgqHJ+4hWTWMIOgr+C2jLx7ZsCReRk+fy5AHr6h0PHQEuXVLXeUy/TDyuY2JPtUZ5jcqvLYgQ== my-amazing-ssh-key"
}
]
}

If you don't remember the content of your SSH public key, you can use the following API call to retrieve it (keyName to be replaced):
GET /me/sshKey/{keyName}

More details can be found in the documentation.

Start time: 10/09/2024 08:30 UTC
End time: 10/09/2024 08:45 UTC
Service impact: None

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - API change for OS reinstallation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 27, 13:00 - 13:15 UTC

Jul 23, 21:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our API offer.

Start time : 27/08/2024 13:00 UTC
End time : 27/08/2024 13:15 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, API will stop to accept SSH key id for OS reinstallation.

entry.title: [Global][Dedicated Servers] - API call removal
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 27, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

Jul 17, 14:35 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our API.

The 27th of August 2024, the following API call will be definitely removed:
GET /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/templateCapabilities

Start time : 27/08/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 27/08/2024 08:45 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : This API call was previously useful for old Windows OS installers that were not compatible with installation on another diskgroup on servers with multiple diskgroups.
Since then all OSes can be installed on any diskgroup.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [WAW1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack W17A07 servers migration
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 19, 06:00 UTC  -  Aug 20, 14:00 UTC

Jul 30, 20:25 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our dedicated servers offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 19/08/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 20/08/2024 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers being moved from W17A07 to W17A01 or W17A02 or W17A03 might be unavailable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will have to move servers from W17A07 to 3 different racks
which are the following: W17A01, W17A02, W17A03.

Thank you for your understanding.
